name: GuideToEurope
0:
”Alexa, open Guide to Europe”
”Alexa, launch Guide to Europe”
”Alexa, talk to Guide to Europe”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guide to europe
des:
Guide to Europe offers the easiest way to book the perfect trip to Europe. With just a few voice actions, or clicks, you can reserve the best vacations to all your dream destinations in Europe.

Our unique technology uses state-of-the-art artificial intelligence in combination with local knowledge and traveler reviews to help you plan the best possible itinerary. No matter how long you choose to stay, or where you want to go, we can provide you with the best travel plan.

You can also opt to add individual services into one shopping cart and checkout your complete vacation at the same time. 

Receive all your booking confirmations at the same and store them in your Guide to Europe app, where your detailed map and travel plan will be accessible even when you’re offline. 

You no more have to spend endless hours trying to understand where to go, what to do, and what to book. You also don’t need to visit multiple websites and complete a number of purchases to be able to travel. Guide to Europe has revolutionized travel to provide you with a better, more personalized and convenient travel experience. 

Developed by Travelshift and coming soon worldwide.
